topics.title: Reddcoin Support
topics.body: Redd ID, and easy support for content publishers of zero-net

topics.title: Different Domain Format
topics.body:
For visual identification of ZeroNet sites, i think we can use another domain space, like a .zeronet

Also we can use different suffix based dommains for different types of content.
like a habrahabr.zforum , gowiththewind.zbook

or even use different types of domain separator( like "-" or "=" or "#" ) or domains space order.

For example:
jonaspeterson-blog, jonaspeterson=blog
beyourself=forum

miketyson#person - for personal page
greecenews#blog

1@163.body:
I want to share info about very perspective coin - Reddcoin  https://www.reddcoin.com/

Very soon it will has a Redd-ID (analog of Namecoin adress) 
It more cheap than namecoin adresses, and we can use different domain name for zeronet sites.
